subject: Dogs
Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race (Alaska)
lead_paragraph: Lance Mackey, who is from Fairbanks, Alaska, won the Iditarod sled-dog race for the third consecutive year when he completed the 1,100-mile trek across the Alaska wilderness, about six hours ahead of the second- and third-place finishers. Mackey slapped hands with fans along Nome’s Front Street and was mobbed by family members after crossing under the city’s famed burled arch at 11:38 a.m. Immediately after winning, he gave treats to his dogs. dogs.
